column1:
8 pts - Identified business function is somewhat unlikely to benefit from scrum/sprint. 

Comment: Good effort in identifying multiple business functions that could benefit from scrum/sprint methodologies, but the prompt asked for just one function. Focus on one function and provide a more detailed explanation of how scrum/sprint could operate for that function.
10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining the scrum/sprint methodology for the design process, but could be more specific. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why Kanban is not suitable for certain functions, but could be more specific in discussing the poor fit. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - You clearly identified the production function as one that could benefit from implementing kanban methodologies. Good job!

10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good job identifying the functions that could benefit from kanban, but try to provide more specific details on how it would operate and the possible columns in the kanban board.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at discussing the poor fit of scrum/sprint for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your explanation. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying the availability heuristic as a potential bias in this situation and providing suggestions on how to avoid it. Keep up the good work!

8/10

You've identified the availability heuristic as a potential cognitive bias that could impact Jackson's decision-making. Your definition and explanation are mostly clear, but could be slightly more concise. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job identifying the availability heuristic and providing suggestions to address it. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job! You provided a clear and detailed description of possible steps and actions for implementing the methodologies in Mighty Jaxx's operations. Keep up the good work!
